Interface AndroidDeviceActionShortcuts

    public interface AndroidDeviceActionShortcuts
extends DeviceActionShortcuts

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void longPressKeyCode(int key)
      Send a long key event to the device.
      void longPressKeyCode(int key, Integer metastate)
      Send a long key event along with an Android metastate to an Android device.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.appium.java_client.DeviceActionShortcuts

    • Method Detail

      • pressKeyCode

        void pressKeyCode(int key)
        Send a key event to the device.
        Parameters:
        key - code for the key pressed on the device.

      • pressKeyCode

        void pressKeyCode(int key,
                Integer metastate)
        Send a key event along with an Android metastate to an Android device. Metastates are things like *shift* to get uppercase characters.
        Parameters:
        key - code for the key pressed on the Android device.
        metastate - metastate for the keypress.
        See Also:
        AndroidKeyCode, AndroidKeyMetastate

      • longPressKeyCode

        void longPressKeyCode(int key)
        Send a long key event to the device.
        Parameters:
        key - code for the key pressed on the device.

      • longPressKeyCode

        void longPressKeyCode(int key,
                    Integer metastate)
        Send a long key event along with an Android metastate to an Android device. Metastates are things like *shift* to get uppercase characters.
        Parameters:
        key - code for the key pressed on the Android device.
        metastate - metastate for the keypress.
        See Also:
        AndroidKeyCode, AndroidKeyMetastate
